trans-unit.source: Manages a related set of tab pages.
trans-unit.target: Gestisce un set correlato di schede.

trans-unit.source: A TabControl contains tab pages, which are represented by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> objects that you add through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: TabControl contiene schede che sono rappresentati da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>oggetti aggiunti tramite il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: The order of tab pages in this collection reflects the order the tabs appear in the control.
trans-unit.target: L'ordine delle schede di questa raccolta corrisponde all'ordine che delle schede visualizzate nel controllo.

trans-unit.source: The user can change the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> by clicking one of the tabs in the control.
trans-unit.target: L'utente può modificare corrente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>facendo clic su una delle schede del controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: You can also programmatically change the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> by using one of the following TabControl properties: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedTab%2A> In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], you can also use one of the following methods: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectTab%2A> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DeselectTab%2A> In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], you can respond when the current tab changes by handling one of the following events: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected> The tabs in a TabControl are part of the TabControl, but not parts of the individual <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls.
trans-unit.target: È possibile modificare anche a livello di codice corrente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>utilizzando una delle seguenti proprietà TabControl:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedTab%2A>In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/add/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], è inoltre possibile utilizzare uno dei metodi seguenti:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectTab%2A>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DeselectTab%2A>In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], è possibile rispondere quando la scheda corrente viene modificato, la gestione di uno dei seguenti eventi:- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected>le schede in un controllo TabControl sono parte del controllo TabControl, ma non da parte dei singoli <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>controlli.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DeselectTab%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectTab%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedTab%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: Members of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> class, such as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> property, affect only the client rectangle of the tab page, but not the tabs.
trans-unit.target: I membri del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>classe, ad esempio il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A>proprietà hanno effetto solo sul rettangolo client della pagina della scheda, ma non le schede.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> will not hide the tab.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>non nasconde la scheda.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Hide%2A>

trans-unit.source: To hide the tab, you must remove the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> control from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: Per nascondere la scheda, è necessario rimuovere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>controllo il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>insieme.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> occur.
trans-unit.target: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], la scheda viene considerata parte della scheda per determinare quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>gli eventi del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>si verificano.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> events of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page.
trans-unit.target: Nelle versioni precedenti di .NET Framework, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>gli eventi del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>non vengono eseguiti quando si attiva o disattiva la scheda, ma solo quando si attiva o disattiva il rettangolo client della scheda.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter>

trans-unit.source: The following events are not raised for the TabControl class unless there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: I seguenti eventi non vengono generati per la classe TabControl a meno che non sia presente almeno un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName>raccolta: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseMove?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseLeave?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseEnter?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseHover?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseUp?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDown?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: If there is at least one <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> in the collection, and the user interacts with the tab control's header (where the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> names appear), the TabControl raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: Se è presente almeno un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>nella raccolta, e l'utente interagisce con l'intestazione del controllo struttura a schede (in cui il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>compaiono), il controllo TabControl genera l'evento appropriato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: However, if the user interaction is within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientRectangle%2A> of the tab page, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> raises the appropriate event.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, se l'interazione dell'utente è all'interno di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientRectangle%2A>della scheda, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>Genera l'evento appropriato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ClientRectangle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Controls contained in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> are not created until the tab page is shown, and any data bindings in these controls are not activated until the tab page is shown.
trans-unit.target: Controlli contenuti un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>non vengono create fino a quando non viene visualizzata la pagina a schede e le associazioni ai dati in questi controlli non vengono attivate finché non viene visualizzata la pagina a schede.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>

trans-unit.source: When visual styles are enabled, and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>, the tab contents might not render correctly.
trans-unit.target: Quando sono abilitati gli stili di visualizzazione e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>proprietà è impostata su un valore diverso da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>, il contenuto della scheda potrebbe non eseguire il rendering correttamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: To work around this issue, you can paint the tab contents yourself using owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: Per risolvere questo problema, è possibile disegnare il contenuto della scheda manualmente usando il disegno personalizzato.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [How to: Display Side-Aligned Tabs with TabControl](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [come: Display Side-Aligned schede con TabControl](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, the tab page contents might not render correctly.
trans-unit.target: Quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>proprietà è impostata su un valore diverso da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>proprietà è impostata su un valore diverso da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, il contenuto della scheda potrebbe non eseguire il rendering correttamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the area of the control (for example, along the top) where the tabs are aligned.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'area del controllo (ad esempio, nella parte superiore) in cui sono allineate le schede.

trans-unit.source: When the Alignment property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Multiline%2A> property is automatically set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Quando la proprietà di allineamento è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Multiline%2A>proprietà viene impostata automaticamente su `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Multiline%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, it only appears as such when the Alignment property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>proprietà, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>viene visualizzata solo in quanto tali quando la proprietà di allineamento è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property displays as if set to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> value.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>consente di visualizzare proprietà come se impostato sul <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>valore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, you must also set the Alignment property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> so that the buttons display correctly.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance>, è inoltre necessario impostare la proprietà di allineamento <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>in modo che i pulsanti visualizzati correttamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A> property to `Buttons`, you must also set the Alignment property to `Top` so that the tab page contents display correctly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando si imposta la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>proprietà `Buttons`, è inoltre necessario impostare la proprietà di allineamento `Top` in modo che il contenuto della scheda visualizzato correttamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Appearance%2A>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, when visual styles are enabled, and the Alignment property is set to a value other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>, the tab contents may not render correctly.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, quando sono abilitati gli stili di visualizzazione e la proprietà di allineamento è impostata su un valore diverso da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>, il contenuto della scheda potrebbe non risultare corretto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Top" name="Top" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_Top" name="Top" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The property value is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà non è un valido <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAlignment"> </xref> valore.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the visual appearance of the control's tabs.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'aspetto visivo delle schede del controllo.

trans-unit.source: When you set the Appearance property to `FlatButtons`, it only appears as such when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A> property is set to `Top`.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta la proprietà di aspetto su `FlatButtons`, viene visualizzato solo come questo tipo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>è impostata su `Top`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the Appearance property appears as if set to the `Buttons` value.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, viene visualizzata la proprietà di aspetto come se impostato sul `Buttons` valore.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you set the Appearance property to `Buttons`, you must also set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A> property to `Top` so that the tab page contents display correctly.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando si imposta la proprietà di aspetto su `Buttons`, è necessario impostare anche la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>proprietà `Top` in modo che il contenuto della scheda visualizzato correttamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Normal" name="Normal" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_Normal" name="Normal" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The property value is not a valid <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance"></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà non è un valido <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabAppearance"> </xref> valore.

trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImage*>le modifiche alle proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImage*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImage%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the BackgroundImageChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImage%2A>proprietà non è significativa per questo controllo, sebbene sia possibile modificarne il valore e gestire l'evento BackgroundImageChanged per rilevare la modifica.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImage%2A>

trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ImageLayout"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is Tile.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è Tile.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImageLayout%2A> property is not meaningful for this control, although you can change its value and handle the BackgroundImageLayoutChanged event to detect the change.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>proprietà non è significativa per questo controllo, sebbene sia possibile modificarne il valore e gestire l'evento BackgroundImageLayoutChanged per rilevare la modifica.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.BackgroundImageLayout%2A>

trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.target: Questo membro esegue l'override <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateControlsInstance*>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateControlsInstance*>

trans-unit.target: Una nuova istanza della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>assegnato al controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlCollection>

trans-unit.target: Ottiene le dimensioni predefinite del controllo.

trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> del controllo.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a tab is deselected.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando una scheda venga deselezionata.

trans-unit.source: When the current tab changes in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, the following events occur in the following order.
trans-unit.target: Quando la scheda corrente cambia un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, si verificano gli eventi seguenti nell'ordine seguente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting> - Deselected - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected> These events let you perform tasks such as canceling a tab change if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> is in an invalid state or updating the state of a newly displayed <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting>- Deselezionato - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected>questi eventi consentono di eseguire attività quali l'annullamento di modifica di una scheda, se una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>è in uno stato non valido o l'aggiornamento dello stato di un appena visualizzato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting>

trans-unit.source: The current tab changes when the user clicks a tab, when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DeselectTab%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectTab%2A> method, or when you change the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedTab%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La scheda corrente viene modificata quando l'utente fa clic su una scheda, quando si chiama il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DeselectTab%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectTab%2A>metodo, o quando si modifica il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedTab%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedTab%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectTab%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DeselectTab%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a tab is deselected, enabling a handler to cancel the tab change.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica prima che una scheda venga deselezionata, consentendo a un gestore di annullare il cambio di scheda.

trans-unit.source: When the current tab changes in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, the following events occur in the following order.
trans-unit.target: Quando la scheda corrente cambia un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>, si verificano gli eventi seguenti nell'ordine seguente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: - Deselecting - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected> These events let you perform tasks such as canceling a tab change if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> is in an invalid state or updating the state of a newly displayed <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.
trans-unit.target: -Deselezionando - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected>questi eventi consentono di eseguire attività quali l'annullamento di modifica di una scheda, se una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>è in uno stato non valido o l'aggiornamento dello stato di un appena visualizzato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected>

trans-unit.source: The current tab changes when the user clicks a tab, when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DeselectTab%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectTab%2A> method, or when you change the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedTab%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La scheda corrente viene modificata quando l'utente fa clic su una scheda, quando si chiama il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DeselectTab%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectTab%2A>metodo, o quando si modifica il valore della <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedTab%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedTab%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectTab%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DeselectTab%2A>

trans-unit.target: Se sono presenti almeno due schede del controllo, la scheda che segue la scheda specificata diventa quella corrente.

trans-unit.source: If the specified tab is the last tab in the control, the first tab becomes the current tab.
trans-unit.target: Se la scheda specificata è l'ultima scheda del controllo, la prima scheda diventa quella corrente.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref> and its child controls and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite usate dal <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"> </xref> e dal relativo elemento figlio di controlli e facoltativamente rilascia le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"></xref> needs to paint each of its tabs if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DrawMode*> property is set to <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabDrawMode"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DrawMode%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabDrawMode>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> raises the DrawItem event whenever it needs to paint one of its tabs.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DrawMode%2A>proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabDrawMode>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>Genera l'evento DrawItem ogni volta che è necessario disegnare una delle relative schede.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabDrawMode> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DrawMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To customize the appearance of the tabs, provide your own painting code in a handler for the DrawItem event.
trans-unit.target: Per personalizzare l'aspetto delle schede, fornire il proprio codice di disegno in un gestore per l'evento DrawItem.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> does not support variable tab sizes with owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>non supporta le dimensioni di scheda variabili di disegno personalizzato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: When you set the DrawMode property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabDrawMode>, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> raises the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DrawItem> event whenever it needs to paint one of its tabs.
trans-unit.target: Quando si imposta la proprietà DrawMode su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabDrawMode>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>Genera il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DrawItem>evento ogni volta che è necessario disegnare una delle relative schede.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabDrawMode>

trans-unit.source: To customize the appearance of the tabs, provide your own painting code in a handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DrawItem> event.
trans-unit.target: Per personalizzare l'aspetto delle schede, fornire il proprio codice di disegno in un gestore per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DrawItem>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.DrawItem>

trans-unit.source: The color that the tab changes to when the mouse is over it is determined by the local computer's system colors.
trans-unit.target: Il colore che la scheda viene modificata per quando il puntatore del mouse su di essa è determinato dai colori di sistema del computer locale.

trans-unit.source: To change the system colors, use Control Panel.
trans-unit.target: Per modificare i colori di sistema, usare il pannello di controllo.

trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta le immagini da visualizzare sulle schede del controllo.

trans-unit.target: Per visualizzare un'immagine in una scheda, impostare la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ImageIndex%2A>proprietà di tale <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ImageIndex%2A>funziona come l'indice in ImageList.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage.ImageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
trans-unit.target: Determina se la chiave specificata è un normale tasto di input o un tasto speciale che richiede pre-elaborazione.

trans-unit.source: Call this method during window-message preprocessing to determine whether the specified key is a regular input key that should be sent directly to the tab control or a special key (such as PAGE UP and PAGE DOWN) that should preprocessed.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato durante la pre-elaborazione di finestra di messaggio per determinare se il tasto specificato è un normale tasto di input che deve essere inviato direttamente al controllo scheda o un tasto speciale (ad esempio PGSU e PGGIÙ) che deve essere pre-elaborato.

trans-unit.source: In the latter case, send the key to the control only if it is not consumed by the preprocessing phase.
trans-unit.target: Nel secondo caso, è possibile inviare la chiave per il controllo solo se non è stato utilizzato nella fase di pre-elaborazione.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uno del <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Keys"> </xref> valori.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified key is a regular input key; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il tasto specificato è un normale tasto di input; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of the control's tabs.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta le dimensioni delle schede del controllo.

trans-unit.source: To change the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> property of the ItemSize property, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A> property must be set to `Fixed`.
trans-unit.target: Per modificare il <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>proprietà della proprietà ItemSize il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A>proprietà deve essere impostata su `Fixed`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SizeMode%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> that represents the size of the tabs.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> che rappresenta le dimensioni delle schede.

trans-unit.source: The default automatically sizes the tabs to fit the icons and labels on the tabs.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito di adattare automaticamente le schede per adattare le icone e le etichette delle schede.

trans-unit.source: The width or height of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"></xref> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: La larghezza o dell'altezza di <xref href="System.Drawing.Size"> </xref> è minore di 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether more than one row of tabs can be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se è possibile visualizzare più di una riga di schede.

trans-unit.source: If Multiline is `false`, only one row of tabs is displayed, even if all the tabs do not fit in the available space.
trans-unit.target: Se la proprietà Multiline `false`, viene visualizzata solo una riga di schede, anche se tutte le schede non corrispondono allo spazio disponibile.

trans-unit.source: In that case, however, arrows are displayed that enable the user to navigate to the undisplayed tabs.
trans-unit.target: In tal caso, tuttavia, sono visualizzate frecce che consentono all'utente di spostarsi sulle altre schede.

trans-unit.source: If the Multiline property is changed to `false` while the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A> property is set to `Left` or `Right`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A> property is automatically reset to `Top`.
trans-unit.target: Se la proprietà Multiline viene modificata in `false` mentre il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>è impostata su `Left` o `Right`, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>proprietà viene reimpostata automaticamente su `Top`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if more than one row of tabs can be displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se più di una riga di schede può essere visualizzata. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Viene generato un evento richiama il gestore dell'evento tramite un delegato.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes how the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl> switches between the selected <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> controls, depending on which keys are pressed.
trans-unit.target: La tabella seguente descrive come <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>Alterna selezionato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>controlli, in base al tasto premuto.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: |Key|Description| |---------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>|Selects the next <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>|Selects the previous <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>|Selects the next <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>|Selects the previous <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.|
trans-unit.target: | Chiave | Descrizione | |---------|-----------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>| Seleziona l'oggetto successivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>| Seleziona il precedente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>| Seleziona l'oggetto successivo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys> + <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>| Selects the previous <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.|</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys></xref:System.Windows.Forms.Keys>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of space around each item on the control's tab pages.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la quantità di spazio intorno a ogni elemento in schede del controllo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that specifies the amount of space around each item.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> che specifica la quantità di spazio intorno a ogni elemento.

trans-unit.source: The default is (6,3).
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è (6,3).

trans-unit.source: The width or height of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: La larghezza o dell'altezza di <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"> </xref> è minore di 0.

trans-unit.source: This event is not meaningful for this control.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento non è significativo per questo controllo.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Previews a keyboard message.
trans-unit.target: Visualizza in anteprima un messaggio della tastiera.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"></xref>, passed by reference, that represents the window message to process.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Message"> </xref>, passato per riferimento, che rappresenta il messaggio della finestra da elaborare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message was processed by the control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il messaggio è stato elaborato dal controllo. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes all the tab pages and additional controls from this tab control.
trans-unit.target: Rimuove tutte le schede e controlli aggiuntivi da questo controllo struttura a schede.

trans-unit.source: All controls are removed through the `Controls` property.
trans-unit.target: Tutti i controlli vengono rimossi tramite il `Controls` proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether right-to-left mirror placement is turned on.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se è attivato il posizionamento con mirroring da destra a sinistra.

trans-unit.source: The RightToLeftLayout property is primarily useful for developing forms for worldwide audiences.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà RightToLeftLayout è particolarmente utile per lo sviluppo di moduli per il pubblico in tutto il mondo.

trans-unit.source: Many containers are designed so that controls are laid out in the container in a left-to-right fashion.
trans-unit.target: Numero di contenitori è progettati in modo che i controlli vengono disposti nel contenitore in modo da sinistra a destra.

trans-unit.source: These containers are compatible with languages that follow this writing direction.
trans-unit.target: Questi contenitori sono compatibili con lingue che seguono questa direzione di scrittura.

trans-unit.source: However, when you display the same containers to users of right-to-left languages, it is often preferable to reverse the order of the controls on the form.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, quando si visualizzano gli stessi contenitori per gli utenti di lingue da destra a sinistra, è spesso preferibile per invertire l'ordine dei controlli nel form.

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> properties are `true`, mirroring will be turned on for the container and control placement and text flow will be right-to-left.
trans-unit.target: Se entrambi i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>sono proprietà `true`, il mirroring verrà attivato per il posizionamento del contenitore e controllo e flusso di testo verrà da destra a sinistra.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.RightToLeftLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected> - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting> - Selected These events let you perform tasks such as canceling a tab change if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> is in an invalid state or updating the state of a newly displayed <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected>- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting>- Selezionato questi eventi consentono di eseguire attività quali l'annullamento di modifica di una scheda, se una <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>è in uno stato non valido o l'aggiornamento dello stato di un appena visualizzato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selecting> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselecting>

trans-unit.target: Quando si verifica questo evento, è possibile controllare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A>proprietà per determinare il nuovo valore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.SelectedIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected> event and use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to determine the index of the selected tab page.
trans-unit.target: In alternativa, è possibile gestire il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected>evento e l'utilizzo di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName>proprietà per determinare l'indice della scheda selezionata.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected>
